body:
True, but it's a maintenance burden, if you want to experiment with the image you have to remember to modify this value.
For instance, if you switch to `nvidia/cuda:8.0-cudnn5-devel`, cuDNN is in `/usr/local/cuda` again since we don't have public deb packages for cuDNN 5 on CUDA 8.0 yet.
